tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr was very helpful and understood my exact joint pain and treated me accordingly

I recently visited an orthopedic specialist for a sprained wrist, and my experience was excellent. The doctor *** ************* *** took the time to explain the injury and treatment options clearly. The clinic's staff were friendly and efficient, making the whole process smooth. The treatment plan, including physical therapy, was effective, and I could see improvement within weeks. The orthopedic's expertise and caring approach made me feel confident in my recovery. Overall, I highly recommend this orthopedic clinic for anyone dealing with a sprain or any orthopedic issue. They provide top-notch care and support for their patients.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Quick, Prompt, friendly and not excessive intrusion, he was busy at the appointed time and called me up to reschedule and then he kept his time without making me wait. He dealt with issue at hand the best and professional way he could. Now we have to wait for two weeks for the bone to heal and then we will know if it is value for time and money.

I was quite glad to find a doctor on a Sunday to treat my wife’s sprained foot. However the billing process was a bit suspicious. Firstly the doctor said that they don’t accept Cashless and that I will need to get it reimbursed from practo. Also the plaster that he applied seemed a bit inflated cost wise. Earlier I was not being given a bill and was quoted 4400/- and when I insisted for a bill they hiked it to 4800/- with no break up of costs of plaster material. The date was also marked incorrectly on the bill whereas it was correct on the prescription. These kinds of issues (might be harmless) however draw suspicion.
reply_text: Cleared u everything....I given bill with breakup...bill was not hiked it was 4700...don't misguide....thanks....

review: He is very patient listener. Reviews 360 degree of body movements before advising the medication. He understands the patient history over a period of time. He is also available on Sundays when most of the Doctor s are not availab.
